discover_best_chefs_desc: Connecting you with talented local chefs who prepare delicious, authentic meals with love and care.
search_placeholder: Search by chef name or specialty...
no_chefs_available: No chefs are available right now
wait_for_chefs: Please check back later to see our talented chefs.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has no dishes available at the moment.
no_reviews_for_dish: This dish has no reviews yet. Be the first to leave one!
login_required_desc: Please log in or create an account to complete your order.
delivery_information_desc: This is where your order will be delivered.
no_address_yet: You haven't added an address yet.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders at this time. Please check back later.
order_error_desc: You must be logged in and have a delivery address to place an order.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: You've been added to the chef's waitlist. You'll be notified when they become available.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} has been sent to the chef for review.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is currently busy with other orders. You can still place your order and you will be added to their queue.
track_your_current_orders: Track your current orders and their status.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and leave reviews.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Start exploring our chefs and discover delicious homemade food.
rate_order_placeholder: How was the dish? Share your thoughts...
last_5_reviews: Here are the last 5 reviews on your dishes.
no_ongoing_orders: No orders are currently in progress.
no_completed_orders: No orders have been completed yet.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage your dishes available for customers.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Add your first dish to start receiving orders.
delete_dish_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the dish '{{name}}' from your menu.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
dish_image_required: A valid image URL is required.
dish_ingredients_required: Please list at least one ingredient.
prep_time_positive: Preparation time must be a positive integer.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
dish_added_toast_desc: {{name}} has been added to your menu.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage promotional coupons for your dishes.
no_coupons_desc: Create your first coupon to attract more customers.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters long.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Code must only contain letters and numbers.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon will apply to.
no_dishes_to_add: You don't have any dishes to select.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after the start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for specific coupons.
coupon_invalid_error: This coupon code is not valid.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not valid for the selected dish.
auth_email_not_allowed: Sorry, this email domain is not allowed for signup.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
auth_email_in_use: This email is already in use. Please log in or use a different email.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special symbol.
new_chef_bio: A passionate chef specializing in {{specialty}} cuisine, ready to bring authentic flavors to your table.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_passwords_do_not_match: The new passwords do not match.
auth_old_password_incorrect: The old password you entered is incorrect.
auth_email_not_found: No account found with this email address.
delivery_address_placeholder: Enter your full address for deliveries
bio_placeholder: Tell us a little about yourself and your cooking style.
profile_updated_desc: Your information has been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: There was an error updating your profile.
pending_orders_desc: You have {{count}} orders in your queue. Check your dashboard to review them.
change_password_desc: For security, choose a strong password that you're not using elsewhere.
password_changed_toast_desc: You can now use your new password to log in.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check your details and try again.
logout_desc: This will log you out of your account on this device.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been added to the chef's queue.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} placed an order while you were busy. It's in your queue.
new_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} has ordered {{dishName}}. Please review it in your dashboard.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is now being prepared.
order_ready_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is ready and will be out for delivery soon.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is out for delivery. Enjoy!
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been delivered. We hope you enjoy it!
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for {{dishName}} was rejected by the chef.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
validation_email_invalid_format: Please enter a valid email format.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If an account with that email exists, we've sent a password reset link.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset_link_sent: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
demo_link_in_console: For this demo, the reset link is printed in the browser console.
unauthorized_email_desc: This email address is not permitted to use this service.
reset_link_sent_desc: If the email is registered, a reset link will be sent.
password_reset_link_invalid: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
password_changed_successfully_desc: You can now log in with your new password.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
chef_login_desc: Welcome back, Chef! Access your dashboard.
customer_signup_desc: Join our community to order delicious homemade meals.
chef_signup_desc: Join our platform to showcase your talent and earn.
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to access the community chat.
community_chat_desc: A place for customers to connect and share experiences.
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Be the first to say something!
